column4: Alrighty .. I booted from my Acer Upgrade CD for vista, and it doesn't seem to find a boot problem any more, and 'fixmbr' and 'fixboot' aren't recognized as internal or external programs in the command prompt .. But it's STILL trying to boot from GRUB .. Any idea?

Alrighty .. I booted from my Acer Upgrade CD for vista, and it doesn't seem to find a boot problem any more, and 'fixmbr' and 'fixboot' aren't recognized as internal or external programs in the command prompt .. But it's STILL trying to boot from GRUB .. Any idea?
Anyone at all?....
grub is installed to the mbr (probably)
No duh, I want it to go away though! :'(
I have no idea what the cd from acer does or why it doesn't work with those commands
I'm in the repair your computer section, and the automatic doo-dad is failing.
you'll have to install another mbr.. the fixmbr command works on some windows install cd in rescue mode
but we can't help you use your acer supplied software.. you'll have to ask acer for help with that.. or a windows channel perhaps
nope.. not kidding
it's a Windows vista install/upgrade cd, that came with my acer laptop ..
yes, I know what it is.. I have one on my desk..I don't know how it works or what it does
describe the disk (In PM if you must)

no, I wont.. I won't boot it up just to try it.. it came with my acer laptop.. but back to the issue.. you've got a problem with a acer restore cd that reinstalls windows.. the ubuntu channel isn't the best place to ask for help with that
you don't need to boot into it to tell me what the disk looks like .. But it's not a restore CD, it's an upgrade CD ..

the mbr is a part of the hard drive (the first track), it just starts things up and then hands off to the rest of the boot program.. you have to have some kind of mbr (either the grub one or whatever comes with windows)
you don't uninstall grub.. you install something else over it
sorry for telling you the truth
but realite doesn't change because you don't like it
why not ask in ##windows , they might be able to help you fix your windows install, reinstall windows or whatever you want to do.. we can help you reinstall/install ubuntu
I'm doing fancy things from morning til late evening (sometimes into the night too=).. but I can't recall asking about anything here
